- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)

## Testing

- [ ] I have tested these changes locally
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

## Documentation

- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation (README, docs/, inline comments)
- [ ] I have added docstrings for new functions/classes
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

## Code Quality

- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes follow the project's code style guidelines
- [ ] I have run linters/formatters (ruff, black, mypy)
- [ ] **No dead code or unused artifacts added**
- [ ] **Hygiene checks pass** (or CI green)

## Checklist for Repository Hygiene PRs

<!-- Only fill this out if Type = Repository hygiene -->

If this PR is from a repository hygiene scan:

- [ ] I have reviewed the `reports/PR_PLAN.md` generated by Steward
- [ ] I have only executed actions marked as SAFE or approved by Consensus
- [ ] I have run tests after each deletion group
- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] No functionality has been broken
- [ ] Orphaned files removed were truly unreferenced
- [ ] Large binaries removed are no longer needed
- [ ] Dead code removal does not break imports
